stories.text:
The un-read message counter for the spam folder stopped working in early October 2021. What is a reasonable expectation for the time to fix this sort of problem?

I have used @verizon.net email addresses for nearly 20 years as a DSL or Fios customer.

Currently, I use the AOL Mail website to access my accounts so that I can see what emails end up in the spam folder.

So, I have to use the AOL Mail website in order to see the spam folder and I have to open the spam folder to see if there are any unread messages.
stories.title: Do any AOL Mail developers read HN?

stories.text: I recently purchased an annual membership for ACM. Primarily for monthly magazine, select ACM Queue articles, and O'Reilly membership. But looks like ACM has a lot of quality content. How to make the best use of it?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to make the best use of ACM membership?
